mdRecord.dcterms:title: Petersburg, Jan'y 10th, 1854: Dear Sir: Below we hand you our views of the Tobacco Trade the present year, with a few suggestions regarding prizing, tendering you our services as Grocers and Commission Merchants / Britton, Todd & Harrison
Dear Sir: Below we hand you our views of the Tobacco Trade the present year
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Britton, Todd & Harrison. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: [4] pages (last 3 pages are blank) ; 26 x 21 cm
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Form letter, with text on the first page of one folded sheet. [original]
Folded for mailing and addressed on p. [4] to J.W. Cunningham, Esq., Cuninghams Store, N.C.; with one cent U.S. postage stamp. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Folded sheet, unbound. Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2015/2016. [original]
